title: Normals freezing during champ select, then gives me a bans

replies.body: It sounds like you are having a connection problem during champion select that's causing some hiccup and getting you left behind.  Getting that penalty sucks, so you'll want to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Be sure to test it out in custom games first to prevent any further timers.  Let me know if you have any questions!
